hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:There was a dog moving around a well whom thirst would have killed. Suddenly a prostitute from the prostitutes of Bani Isra'il happened to see it and she drew water in her shoe and made it drink, and she was pardoned because of this

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ سَاقِي الْبَهَائِمِ الْمُحْتَرَمَةِ وَإِطْعَامِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Giving Food And Water To Animals Which Are Unlawful To Eat
